action.name: Set text

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Errors: " & (3 - errors) & newline & "Chocolates delivered: " & entregadosCounter & newline & "Normal chocolates sorted: " & bombonColorSeparadoCounter & newline & "Defective chocolates sorted: " & defectuosoCounter
